title: OFF-GRID GARDEN WATERING SYSTEM | Tank Set Up

tasks.task: Setting up an off-grid garden watering system
subtasks: Transporting a 1100-gallon water tank to the property
Assembling PVC pipe fittings and gluing joints
Connecting the water tank to the irrigation ditch
Installing valves for water control and future adjustments
Evaluating water pressure from the tank using a garden hose

tasks.task: Constructing an irrigation system for the garden
subtasks: Preparing the garden area for watering
Connecting the tank to the garden via drip irrigation
Testing water flow and pressure for efficiency
